Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Grand, Pulaski and North Ave due to, street blockage near North Ave/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions viaNorth Ave, Grand, Pulaski and North Ave due to, street blockage near North Ave/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
